modName: Skyrim Immersive Creatures and Skyrim Monster Mod - Bashed File
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone! This is a bashed file for compatibility of Skyrim Immersive Creatures ([b]6.5.2c)[/b] and Skyrim Monster Mod (4.01).

[u][i][b]DO NOT ASSUME THAT THIS PATCH WORKS AT 100%
IT'S ONLY A TEST FOR WHO DO NOT USE WRYE BASH
[/b][/i][/u]
INSTALLATION:
Put my file in (...\data) in a Skyrim folder (If you have Wyre Bash replace it)
I dont know if this patch works without Wyre Bash installed, but i think yes.
Enjoy!
PS
English isn't my first language
author: RowGiorgioGJ
